name: Fox bro
text: You remember the plan we came up with last night, hm?

name: Fox bro
text: No?! Do you have a memory of a sheep or something?!

name: Fox bro
text: Okay, okay, no need to growl at me like that! Can’t even crack a joke…

name: Fox bro
text: See those fluffy little sheep? You’ll have to make them follow you along through the entire forest to our hideout. You haven’t forgotten it’s on the other side of the forest, did you?

name: Fox bro
text: Also, I hope you haven’t forgot how to move around with WASD, as well as how to put on Sheep Fur with SPACE.

name: Fox bro
text: Why all this hassle, you ask?

name: Fox bro
text: Well… I doubt they’ll blindly agree to go anywhere with the wolf.

name: Fox bro
text: However, those fluffballs are as dumb as a knob. They won’t suspect anything with that Sheep Fur of yours.

name: Fox bro
text: Go on, be the best shepherd you are! Lead them to the place you need, and they’ll willingly follow you!

name: Fox bro
text: C’mon, begin already! And remember, it’s all for our great goal, he-he.
